description: This Java class defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot REST API, managing custom exceptions and validation errors.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring ControllerAdvice class that globally handles exceptions such as ProductNotFoundException and validation errors, producing structured error responses with timestamps and status information.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles ProductNotFoundException and returns a 404 response with error details.

methods.name: handleMethodArgumentNotValid
methods.description: Overrides default validation error handler to include validation error details in the response.

methods.name: baseBody
methods.description: Creates a standard response body map with timestamp, status, error message.
